Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vespa \Ves"pa\, n. [L., wasp.] (Zo["o]l.) A genus of Hymenoptera including the common wasps and hornets. [1913 Webster]
Vespa n : type genus of the Vespidae: various hornets and yellow jackets [syn: {genus Vespa}]
